abstract.t: This document defines a Cryptographic Message Syntax (CMS) protected content type for use with the Resource Public Key Infrastructure (RPKI) to carry a signature over a detached message. This document is an iteration on RPKI Signed Checklists (RSCs) [RFC9323] to include an explicit purpose and audience, to allow for more secure automated processing. Discussion This note is to be removed before publishing as an RFC. Source for this draft and an issue tracker can be found at https://github.com/AS207960/draft-blahaj-sidrops-rsm.
